title: Le Revenu Scind√©
original_prompt:
A diagram showing a stylized digital wallet icon receiving two distinct glowing streams of liquid light. One thick, steady blue stream represents base revenue, and a second thinner, fluctuating golden stream represents missions. Retro-futuristic infographic style.

Color palette: Deep petrol blue and gold, cream background

Style: Retro-futuristic isometric illustration, clean lines, diagrammatic style, vintage infographic feel.
Texture: Printed on aged, textured cream/off-white paper.
Format: Portrait aspect ratio suitable for A5 card printing.
No text, no words, no letters, no numbers on the image.
revised_prompt: Create a retro-futuristic isometric infographic portraying a stylized digital wallet icon. This wallet should be receiving two distinct glowing streams of liquid light. The first is a thick, steady blue stream which symbolizes base revenue and the other is a thinner fluctuating golden stream representing missions. The color palette to be used includes deep petrol blue, gold, and cream for the background. The entire piece should have clean lines, vintage infographic feel, and a diagrammatic style, giving off the vibe of an old, textured cream or off-white printed paper. Formatted in portrait aspect ratio, it is suitable for A5 card printing. Ensure that the illustration is devoid of any text, words, letters, or numbers.
